entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
